comments.body: If you are wondering, this `typedef` is not used in this file.

Trying to use the C++17 `byte` causes a compilation error below on the `*input >> value` line:

https://github.com/OctoMap/octomap/blob/bf3b3949a99c13ef34d11dc8bc23dcd6680a9f3c/octomap/src/binvox2bt.cpp#L230-L238

<details>
<summary>Just in case the 300+ lines compilation error</summary>

```

/tmp/octomap/octomap/src/binvox2bt.cpp:236:16: error: no match for 'operator>>' (operand types are 'std::ifstream {aka std::basic_ifstream<char>}' and 'std::byte')

         ~~~~~~~^~~~~~~~
```
